column5: Are there any Canadian websites that have current radar available? We access DTN radar for the farm and it would really be nice to have something similar available while on our trips.Pooch

Pooch, put this http://www.ckdr.net/ in your favorites and you can keep up with current events and the weather-radar. By the way, bring up a rain coat, it has been similar weather to your area, only lesser amounts.
